languages.text: {n}Грозно рыкнув, Ульфар сводит брови, и нечто примитивное и древнее внутри вашего мозга заходится в истерике ужаса.{/n} "Не тебе, человек, судить наши овеянные веками кровавой славы традиции. Тебе оказана честь, так заткнись и соответствуй ей!"

{n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"
languages.original_text: {n}Грозно рыкнув, Ульфар сводит брови, и нечто примитивное и древнее внутри вашего мозга заходится в истерике ужаса.{/n} "Не тебе, человек, судить наши овеянные веками кровавой славы традиции. Тебе оказана честь, так заткнись и соответствуй ей!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法对你怒目而视，发出了气势汹汹的咆哮声。你感觉你脑中某种古老而原始的部分陷入了无法克制的恐怖之中。{/n}“几个世纪以来，我们的传统一直沉浸在血腥的荣耀之中。你无权评判我们的传统，人类。我已经赐予了你荣耀，所以你还是赶紧闭嘴，努力配得上这份荣耀吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法对你怒目而视，发出了气势汹汹的咆哮声。你感觉你脑中某种古老而原始的部分陷入了无法克制的恐怖之中。{/n}“几个世纪以来，我们的传统一直沉浸在血腥的荣耀之中。你无权评判我们的传统，人类。我已经赐予了你荣耀，所以你还是赶紧闭嘴，努力配得上这份荣耀吧！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar te fulmina con la mirada y gruñe amenazador. Algo primitivo y ancestral en tu cerebro se sume en el terror absoluto.{/n} «Nuestras tradiciones provienen de siglos de gloria y sangre. No te corresponde juzgarlas, human{mf|o|a}. Se te ha concedido un honor, ¡así que cierra el pico e intenta merecerlo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar te fulmina con la mirada y gruñe amenazador. Algo primitivo y ancestral en tu cerebro se sume en el terror absoluto.{/n} «Nuestras tradiciones provienen de siglos de gloria y sangre. No te corresponde juzgarlas, human{mf|o|a}. Se te ha concedido un honor, ¡así que cierra el pico e intenta merecerlo!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーがにらみつけ、威嚇するように唸ると、あなたの脳の中の原始的で古代の何かがヒステリックな恐怖に陥る。{/n}「我らの伝統は、何世紀にもわたって血にまみれた栄光に彩られてきた。お前はそれを判ずる立場にはないのだ、人間。お前は名誉を与えられているのだから、黙ってそれにふさわしい人間となるがいい！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーがにらみつけ、威嚇するように唸ると、あなたの脳の中の原始的で古代の何かがヒステリックな恐怖に陥る。{/n}「我らの伝統は、何世紀にもわたって血にまみれた栄光に彩られてきた。お前はそれを判ずる立場にはないのだ、人間。お前は名誉を与えられているのだから、黙ってそれにふさわしい人間となるがいい！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar blickt bedrohlich drein und knurrt gefährlich. Etwas Primitives und Uraltes in deinem Gehirn stürzt in hysterische Angst hinab.{/n} "Unsere Traditionen fußen auf jahrhundertelangem, blutgetränktem Ruhm. Es steht Euch nicht zu, darüber zu urteilen, Mensch. Euch wurde eine Ehre gewährt, also haltet den Mund und versucht, ihrer würdig zu sein!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar blickt bedrohlich drein und knurrt gefährlich. Etwas Primitives und Uraltes in deinem Gehirn stürzt in hysterische Angst hinab.{/n} "Unsere Traditionen fußen auf jahrhundertelangem, blutgetränktem Ruhm. Es steht Euch nicht zu, darüber zu urteilen, Mensch. Euch wurde eine Ehre gewährt, also haltet den Mund und versucht, ihrer würdig zu sein!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar vous décoche un regard noir et grogne d'un air menaçant. Quelque chose d'ancien et de primitif dans votre cerveau menace de sombrer dans une terreur hystérique.{/n} « Nos traditions sont imprégnées de siècles entiers de gloire et de sang. Il ne vous appartient pas de les juger, {mf|humain|humaine}. C'est un insigne honneur qui vous est fait, alors taisez-vous et tâchez de vous en montrez digne ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar vous décoche un regard noir et grogne d'un air menaçant. Quelque chose d'ancien et de primitif dans votre cerveau menace de sombrer dans une terreur hystérique.{/n} « Nos traditions sont imprégnées de siècles entiers de gloire et de sang. Il ne vous appartient pas de les juger, {mf|humain|humaine}. C'est un insigne honneur qui vous est fait, alors taisez-vous et tâchez de vous en montrez digne ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, ters ters bakıp tehditkârca hırlıyor. Beynindeki ilkel ve eski bir şey, sende histerik bir korku doğuruyor.{/n} "Geleneklerimiz yüzyıllık kanlı şan ile kaplıdır. Onları yargılamak sana düşmez insan. Sana bir onur bahşettim, çeneni kapayıp layık olmaya bak!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar glowers and growls menacingly, and something primitive and ancient inside your brain descends into hysterical terror.{/n} "Our traditions are steeped in centuries of blood-soaked glory. They are not yours to judge, human. You have been granted an honour, so shut your mouth and try to be worthy of it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar ters ters bakıp tehditkâr şekilde hırlıyor. İlkel ve eski bir şey beyninde histerik bir korkuya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Geleneklerimiz yüzyıllık kanlı şan ile kaplıdır. Onları yargılamak sana düşmez insan. Sana bir onur verdim, çeneni kapat da layık olmaya bak!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
